summary: The module defines abstract base classes that represent an approximate quantum circuit and the associated optimization problem for approximating a target unitary matrix. It provides mechanisms for initializing circuit parameters, building the circuit, and evaluating (and optionally differentiating) an objective function to guide gradient‑free optimization of the circuit parameters.
business_intent: To give library users a structured way to implement custom approximate circuit constructions and corresponding objective functions, facilitating the synthesis of hardware‑compatible quantum circuits that closely approximate desired unitaries.
